We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Office Support Personnel
Job Location:&nbsp;Katsina
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	Bincike International provides a Safe, Secured, clean, friendly environment for our clients, employees, and visitors of the organization.
	We are looking for a vibrant and dedicated Office Support Staff to join our team.


Key Responsibilities


	Clean and sanitize all office surfaces, including desks, countertops, and equipment.
	Empty trash receptacles and replace liners
	Vacuum carpets and sweep and mop floors.
	Clean and disinfect restrooms and replenish supplies.
	Dust and polish furniture and fixtures.
	Assist with organizing and maintaining supply closets and storage area.
	Notify management of any repairs or maintenance needed.
	Follow safety guidelines and protocols to ensure a safe and healthy work environment


Qualifications and Skills


	Educational Background: A Diploma in Office management, or a related field.
	Experience: A minimum of 1 year of experience in a similar role, preferably with a non-governmental organisation (NGO) or in a humanitarian context.
	Skills: Excellent communication, observation, and problem-solving skills. Fluency in English and a local language (e.g., Hausa) is required.

Office Support Personnel Job at Bincike International




        
    

        
        Bincike International is a Nigerian NGO uniquely structured as both a Humanitarian Organization and a social enterprise. As a Humanitarian entity, they provide essential aid and resilience programs to vulnerable populations, especially those affected by conflict and climate change. Simultaneously, as a social enterprise, they empower communities through sustainable micro-enterprise development, equipping individuals with the skills and resources to build small businesses. This dual model allows them to combine grant-funded interventions with market-driven solutions for lasting community empowerment.
